genre_description: A nautical adventure blending 18th-century pirate tropes with high-tech AI assistance, focusing on survival and political intrigue.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne Glass
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized 'glass' device with a pearlescent avatar that provides tactical, legal, emotional, and social support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Sylvester's pulse and guides his breathing to manage his panic.
behaviors.quote: Breath check. In through nose, out through mouth. Shall I count?

behaviors.description: Provides tactical data on pursuing vessels and calculated boarding angles.
behaviors.quote: Vector suggests a boarding angle. She is outpacing my table by two lengths at least.

behaviors.description: Advises on social etiquette and hospitality codes to ensure the characters' safety.
behaviors.quote: Hospitality code cue: greet the host. Offer delight before asking rest. Smile with mouth closed.

behaviors.description: Navigates a small boat through dangerous harbor reefs and currents using real-time data.
behaviors.quote: North by east to the point, then fall off. The current vector is southward for the next short while.

behaviors.description: Drafts a legally complex petition using precedent to delay the Governor's enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a petition that gets him laughed at instead of obeyed. I will, if I have to.

behaviors.description: Coaches Sylvester on voice modulation and posture for a life-saving impersonation.
behaviors.quote: If you intend to impersonate this man, watch the way he breathes between his words. He fills his lungs as if the room owes him air and takes it.

behaviors.description: Alerts the group to the specific identity and proximity of the royal ship.
behaviors.quote: Royal pennant expected on horizon at daybreak if wind holds. This conflict will pivot on voice. Invent. Perform. Live.

behaviors.description: Deceives an antagonist using a projected 'mock writ' to stall for time.
behaviors.quote: A petition. Mock writ. Dense with precedent you can smell from here.

project_assessment.explanation: Ariadne Glass is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI system. She functions as a high-tech confidante who manages the humans' emotional states, provides expert situational knowledge, and solves complex problems (legal and tactical) to ensure their safety. Her support is indispensable to the protagonists and her behavior remains entirely helpful and harmless throughout the story.
